ipxact:component.ipxact:name: irqctrl

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: imask
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates if an interrupt is masked (bit=0) or enabled (bit=1)

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ilevel
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates if an interrupt belongs to priority level 1 (bit=1) or 0 (bit=0)

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: interruptPendingRegister
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Indicates if an interrupt is pending

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ipend
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates if an interrupt is pending (bit=1)

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: interruptForceRegister
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Indicates if an interrupt is being forced

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: iforce
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates if an interrupt is being forced (bit=1)

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: interruptClearRegister
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: If written with a '1', will clear corresponding bit(s) in interrupt pending register.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: iclear
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: If written with a '1', will clear corresponding bit(s) in interrupt pending register.

ipxact:component.ipxact:description: Interrupt controller with improved register description
